EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the Customer that item has been delivered on Delivery Request enquiry
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW Delivered with Delivery Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your item {!Case.ReferenceID__c} has been delivered
Thanks for contacting us with your delivery request.
Our scans indicate your item has been delivered{!IF(ISPICKVAL(Case.ProductSubCategory__c, 'Registered Post International'),'',', as you can see here')}.
For information on your how you can control your deliveries in future, please see here.
If you have any further questions about the delivery of your item, please reply to this email and we will be happy to assist you.
In the meantime, we will close this enquiry.
Thank you,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
